```
lib_LTLIBRARIES = libjupiter.la
libjupiter_la_SOURCES = jup_print.c
libjupiter_la_CPPFLAGS = -I$(top_srcdir)/include -I$(top_srcdir)/common
libjupiter_la_LIBADD = ../common/libjupcommon.la
```
